about_the_game:
The Expert Bundle is for the "Black Coats" in the kitchen who are at the very top of their game. This has the best tools of the trade and piles of spoons to make sure you keep your spot at the head of the cooking line!

This Bundle contains:

5000 Spoons to help you upgrade your kitchen equipment;

10 +3 Customers boosts, so you have people to serve when it counts;

10 +30 Seconds boosts, so you can add time to the clock when you need it;

5 Price Doubler boosts that helps you earn more coins;

5 Waiter boosts that helps serve your dishes automatically to keep your hands free to cook;

5 Insta-Cook boosts to make your meals in a flash;

5 Burn-Proofer boosts that keeps your food looking fresh if you leave it cooking for too long;

10 Second Chance boosts to give you a do-over if you make a mistake;

10 Dazzler boosts that can stop everything when the going gets rough.

This is what makes you the head chef, with the biggest load you can get to make your kitchen then very best!

name: Cooking Craze - Expert Bundle
short_description: This is what makes you the head chef, with the biggest load you can get to make your kitchen then very best! You get 5000 spoons, 10 each of the best boosts, 5 each of the rest!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
